title: Amazon Echo Dot just hit $19.99 in Black Friday deals, with a free smart bulb
author: james-peckham
summary: This is one to pick if you're starting to build a smart home
article: The Amazon Echo Dot is one of the best ways to start building a smart home, and today you can get the smart speaker alongside a free smart bulb for just $19.99 with this early Black Friday deal.

We saw both these products on sale earlier this week, but the price was still $24.99. We recommended the bundle then as it was a fantastic deal, so now the price has dropped we can say it's even better than ever.
This gives you savings of $34.99, if you compare it to buying both of these products separately.

The 3rd generation Echo Dot works with Amazon Alexa to play music, answer questions, make calls, and control your smart home devices. You can use your voice to ask Alexa about the weather, traffic, news, and more, all completely hands-free.
The compact smart speaker can also play your favorite tunes from services like Amazon Music, Apple Music, and Spotify and connects with other Echo devices to play music in every room.
